name: Beneath The Fallen - Prototype (MixMasterZ)
description:
The world is broken and ruined. Humanity has desperately escaped down to the old metro tunnels to survive. It's up to you to explore the old metro tunnels and fight against the various dangers beneath the fallen world of humans in order to slowly rebuild humanity.

This game originally started as a school project, but we want this game to be more than just that. 

NOTE: This is an early prototype/proof of concept. We are also pretty new when it comes to game development. So any tips or feedback would be much appreciated!
